creator: manbri
title: Create a Light Sensitive Wall
description: The project aims to create a light-sensitive wall using photoluminescent paint. The wall can be 'charged' by exposure to light, and then it releases light relatively slowly, creating an interactive feature for spaces like concert halls.
steps: Experiment with different layers of photoluminescent and black paint to achieve the desired effect. Initially, painting the wall with photoluminescent paint first and then with black paint did not work well.
Trying with the black paint first and then the photosensitive paint worked better, but the color was not ideal.
Mix both the photoluminescent and black paints directly to achieve a nice anthracite color and a good photosensitive result.
Apply the mixed paint to the wall.
Expose the wall to different light sources (phone lights, beamer, laser lights) to test the light-sensitive effect.
